ygData.subject: Re: Where can I buy pottery sketches as a Dark Elf?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well.... There is supposedly a merchant in the middle of South Ro that sells sketches and sells to evil races.  I haven t gone there yet because so far I have
ygData.messageBody:
Well.... There is supposedly a merchant in the middle of South Ro that sells
sketches and sells to evil races. I haven't gone there yet because so far I
have been able to get friends of mine to buy the sketches for my in
Freeport. If this merchant does exist I would like to know also and if
there are any other evil merchants out there who sell sketches I would like
to know that.

Azerin
Dark Elf Necro and master potter

-----Original Message-----

Are there any evil potters out there that can tell
me where to find pottery sketches? I have access
to all other items in Neriak but unless I missed
it, none of the evil cities have the sketches.
